snippet.title: My Work Is Not Yet Done | APOSTASIS
snippet.description:
Support on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/spncryn/my-work-is-not-yet-done

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1207690/My_Work_Is_Not_Yet_Done

Credits:
Trailer edited by Sawyer Smith
Using footage from Emma Wilkins (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JtaaOua2EbM)
Track samples "Drift" by Mica Levi and "SUFFOCATION" by HEAVY HEARTS

EDIT [16 January 2020, 12:31 EST]: I've noticed a bunch of comments -- most of them charitable, some not so much -- about some of the design decisions and rationale behind this trailer. Regardless of where you're coming from, if you have any questions regarding this matter, I wrote a case study earlier which goes into a lot of detail about both the technical and narrative construction of the trailer, and which can hopefully address your questions and/or concerns: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/spncryn/my-work-is-not-yet-done/posts/2725083
